org.plexian.grumy.world

Class DialogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.world.DialogManager

  • public class DialogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the dialog for the world, allows for the addition and deletion of in-game dialog.
    Author:
    walt

      DialogManager(World world)
      Create a new DialogManager for world $world.
